name: Telepobox
description:
2D puzzle action game where you use magic to switch places.

When the magic hits the purple block, the place is switched.
Use the magic to go for the goal!
If the number of teleportation is small, you can complete mission!

----- Controls -----

< Menu >

* Mouse Cursor or Arrow Keys - Select
* Mouse Click or [Z] - Confirm
* [X] - Back

< Game >

* Left and Right Arrows - Move
* Up Arrow - Jump
* [Z] - Fire Magic
* Space - Pause
* [R] - Retry
